text: The 2019–20 season will be Debreceni VSC's 42nd competitive season, 27th consecutive season in the OTP Bank Liga and 117th year in existence as a football club. == First team squad == Source: ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: Out: Source: ===Winter=== In: Out: Source: ==Competitions== ===Overview=== ===Nemzeti Bajnokság I=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ====Matches==== ===Hungarian Cup=== ===Europa League=== ====First qualifying round==== ====Second qualifying round==== ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== :Last updated on 27 June 2020. |- |colspan="14"|Youth players: |- |colspan="14"|Out to loan: |- |colspan="14"|Players no longer at the club: |} ===Top scorers=== Includes all competitive matches.
